ul.li1: 1Gather yourselves together! Now gather together,
ul.li2: O nation having no shame!
ul.li1: 2Before the birth of the decree,
ul.li2: the day flies away like chaff;
ul.li1: before the fierce anger of Yahweh overtakes you;
ul.li2: before the day of the anger of Yahweh overtakes you.
ul.li1: 3Seek Yahweh, all you afflicted of the land
ul.li2: who have fulfilled his law;
ul.li1: seek righteousness;
ul.li2: seek humility.
ul.li1: Perhaps you will be concealed
ul.li2: on the day of the anger of Yahweh.

ul.li2: and Ashkelon as a desolation.
ul.li1: As for Ashdod, at noon they will drive her away,
ul.li2: and Ekron shall be uprooted.
ul.li1: 5Woe to you, inhabitants of the region of the sea,
ul.li2: people of the Kerethites!
ul.li1: The word of Yahweh is against you,
ul.li2: O Canaan, land of the Philistines.
ul.li1: I will destroy you until there is no inhabitant.Literally “from there is not an inhabitant”
6And you, O region of the sea, shall become
ul.li2: pastures and meadows for shepherds
and sheep pens for the flocks.
ul.li1: 7And it shall become a region
ul.li2: for the remnant of the house of Judah;
upon them they shall graze,
ul.li1: and in the houses of Ashkelon
ul.li2: they shall lie down in the evening.
ul.li1: For Yahweh their God shall be mindful of them,
ul.li2: and he will restore their fortunes.
ul.li1: 8I have heard the reproaches of Moab
ul.li2: and the scorning of the Ammonites,Literally “sons/children of Ammon”
ul.li1: with which they have taunted my nation
ul.li2: and made boasts against their territory.

ul.li2: the God of Israel—
ul.li1: “Moab shall be as Sodom,
ul.li2: and the AmmonitesLiterally “sons/children of Ammon” like Gomorrah,
ul.li1: a place of weeds and salt pits
ul.li2: and a desolation forever.
ul.li1: The remnant of my people shall plunder them,
ul.li2: and the remainder of my nation shall possess them.”
ul.li1: 10This shall be for them in place of their pride
ul.li2: because they mocked and boasted
against the people of Yahweh of hosts.

ul.li2: for he will destroy all the gods of the earth
ul.li1: and all the landsOr “islands” of the nations;

ul.li2: and he will destroy Assyria
ul.li1: and will make Nineveh a desolation,

ul.li2: every wild animal of a nation;
